author: Gary 'gaz' Regan
description: A Manhattan variation calling for Irish whiskey instead of bourbon or rye, mixed with equal parts sweet vermouth, orange liqueur and a dash of orange bitters - respectfully Regan's Orange Bitters.
name: Dubliner Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
